name: Beautiful Things
description: Beautiful Things is a captivating single by Benson Boone that has topped the charts in May 2024.
long_description: Beautiful Things by Benson Boone has captured the hearts of many with its emotional depth and melodic charm. The song explores themes of love and beauty, resonating deeply with listeners.

name: Shotta Flow
description: Shotta Flow by NLE Choppa continues to dominate the charts with its energetic and catchy beats.
long_description: Released in 2024, Shotta Flow by NLE Choppa is a high-energy track that has become immensely popular due to its infectious rhythm and memorable lyrics. The song is a testament to NLE Choppa's unique style and has garnered millions of streams.

name: Gata Only
description: Gata Only by FloyyMenor is a standout track that has quickly risen in popularity.
long_description: Gata Only, a hit single by FloyyMenor, features a unique blend of rhythms and an addictive beat that has captivated listeners worldwide. The song's dynamic production and catchy hook make it a favorite among fans.

name: we can't be friends (wait for your love)
album: we can't be friends (wait for your love)
description: Ariana Grande's 'we can't be friends (wait for your love)' is a poignant track that resonates with listeners.
long_description: This emotional track by Ariana Grande explores themes of unrequited love and the complexities of relationships. With its heartfelt lyrics and Ariana's powerful vocals, the song has become a significant hit.

name: i like the way you kiss me
album: i like the way you kiss me
description: Artemas' 'i like the way you kiss me' is a romantic hit that has won over many fans.
long_description: Artemas brings a tender and romantic vibe with 'i like the way you kiss me,' a song that captures the magic of intimate moments. Its soothing melody and heartfelt lyrics have made it a favorite among listeners.

name: Baianá
description: Baianá by Bakermat is a vibrant track that has captured the attention of many.
long_description: Bakermat's 'Baianá' is an energetic track that blends electronic beats with traditional sounds, creating a unique and infectious rhythm that has made it a standout hit.

name: redrum
description: 21 Savage's 'redrum' is a powerful track that has gained significant popularity.
long_description: With its dark and compelling lyrics, 'redrum' by 21 Savage delves into intense themes and showcases his lyrical prowess. The track's haunting beat and storytelling have captivated a large audience.

name: yes, and?
description: Ariana Grande's 'yes, and?' is another hit that showcases her vocal talent.
long_description: In 'yes, and?', Ariana Grande explores themes of self-empowerment and resilience. The song's uplifting message and Ariana's impressive vocal range have made it a favorite among fans.

name: TEXAS HOLD 'EM
description: Beyoncé's 'TEXAS HOLD 'EM' is a dynamic track that has resonated with listeners.
long_description: Beyoncé delivers a powerful performance in 'TEXAS HOLD 'EM,' a song that blends elements of pop and R&B. The track's engaging rhythm and Beyoncé's commanding presence have made it a chart-topper.

name: Too Sweet
description: Hozier's 'Too Sweet' is a soulful track that has captured the hearts of many.
long_description: Hozier's 'Too Sweet' combines soulful melodies with poignant lyrics, creating a deeply moving track. The song's emotional depth and Hozier's unique vocal style have made it a standout hit.
